item.description:
Ballroom & Latin Dance Party

SAMBA Lesson by Daniella !!!

Dance lesson at 7:00 - All levels

Dancing 8:00 onward.

This MeetUp features an all-levels lesson, followed by general dancing to a wide variety of Latin, Ballroom and Contemporary music, including salsa, cha-cha, rumba, bachata, merenge and more. Complementary Pizza and cookies - and beverages - usually coffee, water and wine.

The lesson starts off simply with easy basics and usually moves into something more challenging for experienced dancers.

Check  http://americanballroomlatin.com/ for details.

SAMBA is considered the dance of celebration and joy at Carnival celebrations in Rio. It is lively and rhythmical. The basic footwork of the Samba includes fast, three-step weight changes with a slight knee lift, led with alternating feet.

After the lesson - general dancing to Latin, Ballroom and Contemporary music. This is your time to have fun practicing what you have learned with other dancers, dance to social mixers and have fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me after the lesson - the folks at the desk can point me out to you. Also - I have been printing out a meetup sign to put on one of the tables to give us a place to gather.

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Third Friday Ballroom & Latin Dance Lounge
